author: sky.cactus
content: Does anyone know of a transaction visualization like <http://www.ethviewer.live/> or <https://txstreet.com/v/eth> that correctly filters invalid transactions?

author: sky.cactus
content: Both of them end up having a pretty confusing view because there are transactions in the pending pool that *cannot* be mined (e.g., they are blocked by a low gas price nonce).

author: sky.cactus
content: So when you look at the high gas price transactions in ethviewer.live, you always see a bunch of high gas price transactions that just sit there, rather than getting included.

author: sky.cactus
content: I want to use one of these for training materials, but that adds a *lot* of confusion.
